text: The Wills Masters was a golf tournament held in Australia and played annually from 1963 to 1975. The Wills Classic had been held in Australia from 1960 and 1962. Total prize money from 1963 to 1965 was A£4,000. In 1966 and 1967 it was A$8,000 increasing to A$10,000 in 1968, A$20,000 from 1969 to 1971, A$25,000 in 1972 and A$35,000 from 1973 to 1975. The sponsor was W.D. & H.O. Wills, a cigarette manufacturer. ==Winners== {|class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" !Year !! Winner !! Country !! Venue !! Score !! Margin of victory !! Runner(s)-up !! In 1968 Player won at the second extra hole. ==References== Category:Golf tournaments in Australia Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1963 Category:Recurring events disestablished in 1975 Category:1963 establishments in Australia Category:1975 disestablishments in Australia
